Priketsu (プリケツ, Puriketsu) is a character in the series Henjin no Salad Bowl.


Appearance
She has blue and pink hair with pink eyes.

Personality
Asumi is a kind young woman. She quickly becomes friends with Livia.

Background
Priketsu is a 20 year-old woman who is currently living as a run-away for unknown reasons. Her real name is Her real name is Asumi Yumisashi (弓指 明日美, Yumisashi Asumi).

She worked at the Cabaret Club 'Koi Hime' as a hostess. She was tasked with showing the new hire Livia, the ropes. After the police raided the club and her previous band 'Setsuko, That ain't a Drop' breaking up, she ended up getting a part-time job at a Karaoke place. She later starts a new band with Livia and Noa, called 'Grasshopper the Savior'.
